rows.label: qev091101_MSG0001
rows.name: I'm sure you can guess why I've asked you here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0002
rows.name:
The Ganglion are mobilizing at Bedrock Hold in Primordia.
We think they're going to strike NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0003
rows.name:
So we're not going to wait.
Instead, a strike team will lead an attack and seize the fortress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0004
rows.name: Sounds right up my alley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0005
rows.name: I was hoping you'd say that, Frye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0006
rows.name: I'd like you to lead the strike team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0007
rows.name: Sure thing, boss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0008
rows.name:
The rest of you will remain behind
and guard New LA's perimeter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0009
rows.name: What, we're not all going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0010
rows.name: The city's defenses can't spare everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0011
rows.name:
If more Ganglion forces struck,
New LA would crumble in hours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0012
rows.name: Guess that's true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0013
rows.name: I'll guard the city. Playing offense isn't my thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0014
rows.name: All right. Phog here will head up the defensive effort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0015
rows.name: As a Prospector, that makes more sense anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0016
rows.name: How about you? Which team will you join?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_JNK0010
rows.name: Attack

rows.label: qev091101_SEL0011
rows.name: Go to Bedrock Hold with Frye.

rows.label: qev091101_JNK0020
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: qev091101_SEL0021
rows.name: Stay behind and guard the city with Phog.

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0017
rows.name: Why ain't I surprised?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0018
rows.name: Just follow me. I'll get you home safe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0019
rows.name: Or more likely, I'll follow while you do the heavy lifting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0020
rows.name: But at least I'll be watching your back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0021
rows.name: I'll begin the briefing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0022
rows.name: Frye, you take the strike team and head for the hold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Take out as many of the assault forces
they've assembled there as you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0024
rows.name:
With any luck, we can prevent
this attack on New LA completely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0025
rows.name: Any questions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0026
rows.name:
There's more than just these new forces at the base, right?
What do we do with the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Your only targets are the ones planning to hit the city.
You can ignore the rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0028
rows.name: Roger that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0029
rows.name: Any other questions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0030
rows.name: Okay. Phog? I'll explain your role in a second.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0031
rows.name: Good luck, strike team. Dismissed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0032
rows.name: I appreciate the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0033
rows.name: Agreed. Together you should be more than enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0034
rows.name: Everyone else will join Frye on the strike team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0035
rows.name: I'll begin the briefing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0036
rows.name:
Frye, you and the strike team will take out
as much of their force as you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0037
rows.name: Roger that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0038
rows.name: Phog, you'll assemble your team outside the east gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0039
rows.name: But sir, Bedrock Hold is to the west.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0040
rows.name: Right, and you'll be keeping them busy on that side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0041
rows.name:
However, the Ganglion forces in the east
will likely head west once the attack starts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0042
rows.name: ...Taking them right to New LA's doorstep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0043
rows.name: Exactly. So we need to be ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0044
rows.name:
We may still need to call you back from the hold,
but this will buy us time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0045
rows.name: Keeping one step ahead. I like it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0046
rows.name:
But if reinforcements did slip past
and you were caught betweenâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0047
rows.name:
Our intelligence suggests that
such a possibility is almost nil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0048
rows.name: Understood. Still, be careful out there, brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0049
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0050
rows.name: Hey, hold up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0051
rows.name:
You've gone on missions with Phog before, right?
How, uh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0052
rows.name: How was he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev091101_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Frye that Phog performed excellently.

rows.label: qev091101_JNK0040
rows.name: Chuckle

rows.label: qev091101_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell Frye that Phog is...unique,
but that it is part of his charm.

rows.label: qev091101_JNK0050
rows.name: Criticize

rows.label: qev091101_SEL0051
rows.name: Bluntly tell Frye that Phog was difficult to work with.

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0053
rows.name: I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0054
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0055
rows.name:
He seems cold. Like he can't be bothered
to defend his own flesh and blood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0056
rows.name: He's always off in his own little world. Creeps me out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0057
rows.name: I never have any clue what he's thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_JNK0060
rows.name: Argue

rows.label: qev091101_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Frye what Phog told you about their father.

rows.label: qev091101_JNK0070
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev091101_SEL0071
rows.name: Hear Frye out.

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0058
rows.name: ...Dad stayed on Earth because he wanted to?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0059
rows.name: Heh. What a load of crap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0060
rows.name: Preserving human life was everything to him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0061
rows.name: What better way to do that than by signing up for the Whale?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0062
rows.name: He'd never turn that down! Not in a million years![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0063
rows.name:
He's always been the genius type.
Pulls off ridiculous stuff like it's nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0064
rows.name:
But I can't accept him. I can't love someone
who doesn't value his own father's life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0065
rows.name: Sorry. Anyway, back to the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0066
rows.name: Jobs like this, I just want to get 'em done and hit the diner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091101_MSG0067
rows.name: You know, kick back a cold one. Or 20![ST:wait ]
